```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
source("R/plot_detection_prob.R")
```

# Overview

This report summarizes the detection probability estimates for species at NEON sites under a simulated 20% abundance increase.

```{r}
plot_detection_prob(detection_summary)

```

```{r}
kable(det_summary, digits = 3, caption = "Detection Probabilities with Credible Intervals") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE)
```
